tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ecosystems (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE species (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, ecosystem_id INT NOT NULL REFERENCES ecosystems(id));

CREATE TABLE Species (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  ecosystem_id INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  species_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Observations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT,
  ecosystem_id INT,
  date_observed DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (ecosystem_id) REFERENCES Ecosystems(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchResults (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id INT,
  observation_id INT,
  result TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (observation_id) REFERENCES Observations(id)
);
